entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
